hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -q '\.py$'; then uv run ruff check --fix "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>&1 | head -20; uv run ruff format "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>&1 | head -5; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -q 'cdk/.*\.ts$'; then cd cdk && pnpm exec tsc --noEmit --pretty 2>&1 | head -30 && pnpm run cdk synth --quiet 2>&1 | head -20; fi
